property.name: reddening
property.description: Foreground reddening, E(B-V), measured directly from the Schlegel et al 1998 maps (they do not include the recalibration by Schlafly & Finbiener 2011)

property.name: magnitudeApparentV
property.description: Apparent V magnitude in Vega mags

property.name: massDynamicalHalfLightRadius
property.description: Dyanmical mass within the half-light radius.

property.name: massNeutralHydrogen
property.description: Mass of neutral hydrogen gas (calculated for the adopted distance modulus), M_HI (M_sun)

property.name: massStellar
property.description: Stellar mass (often computed assuming a V-band stellar mass-to-light ratio of 1 in Solar units).

property.name: membership
property.description: Group membership (G=Milky Way; A=M31; L=Local Group; N=Nearby).

property.name: positionAngle
property.description: Position Angle of major axis in degrees measured east from north

property.name: positionHeliocentricCartesian
property.description: Position in a Cartesian coordinate system centered on the Sun.

property.name: properMotionRightAscension
property.description: Proper motion in right ascension direction.

property.name: radiusHalfLightAngular
property.description: Half-light radius measured on major axis, rh(arcmins)

property.name: radiusExponentialScaleLengthV
property.description: Radial exponential scale length in V-band, reV(arcmins)

property.name: radiusExponentialScaleLengthI
property.description: Radial exponential scale length in I-band, reI(arcmins)

property.name: surfaceBrightnessEffectiveV
property.description: Mean surface brightness within the half-light radius.

property.name: velocityAzimuthalMilkyWay
property.description: Azimuthal velocity relative to Milky Way center.

property.name: velocityLocalGroup
property.description: Velocity relative to Local Group center.

property.name: velocityMilkyWay
property.description: Velocity relative to Milky Way center.

property.name: velocityRadialMilkyWay
property.description: Radial velocity relative to Milky Way center.

property.name: velocityVerticalMilkyWay
property.description: Vertical velocity relative to Milky Way center.
